response.name: Read Food Detail by id
response.body:
{
    "id": "680c97f41a115182cc816257",
    "name": "Garlic Bhujia",
    "category": "Bhujia",
    "unit": "193",
    "price": 120,
    "discountedPrice": 108,
    "description": "Crispy, Savoury and Crunchy, made with a blend of lentils and spices. We make the traditional Indian snack with . Perfect snack to enjoy with a cold drink or as an accompaniment to a meal. Made with care and quality ingredients, ensuring that you get a delicious and satisfying snack every time.",
    "refundPolicy": "This Item is non-returnable. For a damaged, defective, incorrect or expired item, you can request a replacement within 72 hours of delivery.\\r\\nIn case of an incorrect item, you may raise a replacement or return request only if the item is sealed/ unopened/ unused and in original condition.",
    "disclaimer": "Every effort is made to maintain the accuracy of all information. However, actual product packaging and materials may contain more and/or different information. It is recommended not to solely rely on the information presented.",
    "flavour": "Garlic",
    "shelfLife": "180 days",
    "dietPreference": "Veg",
    "ingredients": "Gram Flour, Groundnut Oil, Garlic Paste, Starch, Iodised Salt & Red Chilli Powder.",
    "imageUrls": [
        "https://d11a0m43ek7ap8.cloudfront.net/Garlic Bhujia-01.png?w=1080"
    ]
}

item.description: - StartFragment - `base_url` [ = http://localhost:5000](http://localhost:5000) - `category` = `makhana` (example) - `tags` = `bestseller` - `page` = `0` - `size` = `24` - `sortBy` = `priority` - `direction` = `DESC` - `foodId` = _set after creating a food_ - `imageFile` = _choose an image from your machine for file uploads_ - EndFragment
